class.name: VisualShaderNodeTransformCompose
class.brief_description: <<<<<<< HEAD Composes a [Transform] from four [Vector3]s within the visual shader graph. ======= Composes a [Transform3D] from four [Vector3]s within the visual shader graph. >>>>>>> 5d9cab3aeb3c62df6b7b44e6e68c0ebbb67f7a45
class.description: Creates a 4x4 transform matrix using four vectors of type [code]vec3[/code]. Each vector is one row in the matrix and the last column is a [code]vec4(0, 0, 0, 1)[/code].
